title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - The file is dirtied but not changed, and code assist does not appear.
OB: When opening a Java file and placing the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call, the file becomes dirtied but not changed. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: When opening a Java file and placing the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call, the file should remain unchanged and the code assist feature should appear.
SR:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below: 
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press Ctrl + Space to invoke the code assist feature.
